name: Comprehensive Year-Round Learning
description: Clubhouses provide high quality afterschool and summer programs to youth. All programs incorporate Boys & Girls Club youth development strategy; providing a sense of belonging, influence, and competence. Programs include: - Academic and homework assistance - Mentorship - School transition support - Physical fitness - Leadership cultivation programs - Recreational activities The Clubhouses offer a safe and welcoming space for members to access a range of services in-person including basic needs (
